articles.headline: Raiders looking for answers after 'embarrassing' Chiefs loss
articles.description: The Raiders dropped to 2-5 thanks to an abysmal offensive performance in a 31-0 loss to the Chiefs that saw them total just 95 yards on a franchise record-low 30 offensive plays.

articles.headline: Raiders' Meyers, Bowers inactive, Crosby hurt in loss to Chiefs
articles.description: The Raiders, already without top pass catchers Jakobi Meyers (knee/toe) and Brock Bowers (knee), lose defensive end Maxx Crosby (knee/back) and defensive tackle Adam Butler (back) to injuries against the Chiefs.

articles.headline: Patrick Mahomes leads Chiefs to 31-0 rout of Raiders as Rashee Rice returns with 2 TDs
articles.description: — The Kansas City Chiefs so thoroughly dominated the Las Vegas Raiders on Sunday that they probably didn't need Rashee Rice, who had come back from a torn ACL and a six-game suspension to give them yet another dynamic weapon.

articles.headline: Vikings' T.J. Hockenson: 'Ridiculous' that TD was overturned
articles.description: T.J. Hockenson was livid Sunday when NFL replay overturned a fourth-quarter touchdown catch that would have closed the Philadelphia Eagles' lead to two points in the Vikings' eventual 28-22 loss.

articles.headline: Jalen Hurts authors perfect passer rating in Eagles' victory
articles.description: In the throes of a two-game losing streak, Philadelphia leaned on Jalen Hurts to help author an impressive 28-22 victory over the Minnesota Vikings on Sunday, pushing the Eagles' to 5-2 on a day when their quarterback threw for 326 yards and three scores.

articles.headline: Patriots rout the Titans 31-13 in coach Mike Vrabel's return to Tennessee
articles.description: — Mike Vrabel greeted his New England Patriots with a celebratory hug just as he did with the Tennessee Titans not far away in Nissan Stadium and not too long ago.

articles.headline: Patriots make Cam Ward pay for fumble by scoring a TD
articles.description: Cam Ward's fumble is picked up by K'Lavon Chaisson for a Patriots defensive touchdown vs, the Titans.

articles.headline: Lamb has a 74-yard TD catch and Bland gets a pick-6 as Cowboys beat Commanders 44-22
articles.description: — CeeDee Lamb ran sideways, arms in the air with the ball in one hand while finishing off a 74-yard touchdown catch with new sidekick George Pickens backpedaling into the end zone at the same time from just a few yards away.

articles.headline: NFL Week 7: Biggest questions, takeaways for every game
articles.description: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions out of each game. Here's what we learned from Week 7.

articles.headline: Jayden Daniels exits Commanders' loss; MRI on hamstring next
articles.description: Commanders quarterback Jayden Daniels suffered a right hamstring injury early in the third quarter against the Dallas Cowboys on Sunday and was later ruled out, yet another blow to a banged-up Washington offense.

articles.headline: Washington Commanders vs. Dallas Cowboys Game Highlights
articles.description: Washington Commanders vs. Dallas Cowboys Game Highlights

articles.headline: Week 7 NFL highlights: Best plays, moments and touchdowns
articles.description: A look at the best plays around the NFL in Week 7.
